company_name: SCEA ETS HORTICOLES DES GORDES PERRIN

information: The company SCEA ETS HORTICOLES DES GORDES PERRIN, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1987, which operates in the Nurseries industry. It also operates in the Textile plants, and Indoor and greenhouse plants, floristry industries. It is based in Simandres, France.
